content: since we worked in round for the first half of our work we have a little bit of seaming together the shoulders lay the top flat with the upper parts neatly on the top of of each other using the yarn needle seam the parts together i like to use the mattress stitch measure 38/39/39/40 cm in the middle of upper part for your neck hole seam the shouldes together leaving the hole for a neck try the top on before weaving the ends in see how big you like the neck hole if you like your top to be more or less off the shoulders and adjust it to your liking on both sides see the photo 7 below the dashed lines show where to sew the shoulders together photo 7 weave in the ends and that s it if you prefer to read a crochet diagram this diagram is for the size small using the method one you make two identical panels for other sizes use the amount of chains given at the beginning depending on the size you want feel free to sell items created from this pattern but please do not copy distribute or sell this patter as your own credit me sonia from owlystitch and provide link to www etsy com/shop/owlystitch www instagram com/owly_stitch www facebook com/owlystitch if you are having any problems with the pattern contact me i ll be happy to help and of course i d love to see your finished projects so please tag me if you share your finihed products on social media
